I will be in a few moments the guest of the show "Words and deeds" on France 2! http://t.co/EaXM2v7g # Holland2012 #DPDA
I have been a candidate for many months, I am preparing for this meeting. I never thought it would be easy. # Holland2012 #DPDA
I work and I do not leave my line: consistency, consistency and trust. # Holland2012 #DPDA
I am not the weapon of distrust. I am not a candidate against, I am a candidate for France. # Holland2012 #DPDA
Until the first round, I must make it clear to the French that they will make the choice of their destiny. # Holland2012 #DPDA
The French can trust them and what I propose to them. # Holland2012 #DPDA
I have the courage, I hold good and I will go to the end! # Holland2012 #DPDA
I considered that my responsibility as possible President was to send a signal, to propose a moral measure. # 75% # Holland2012
I will restore the wealth tax. #ISF # Holland2012 #DPDA
To respect the French would be a mistake? # Holland2012 #DPDA
What I want is to gather the French. I do not want to pit them against each other, divide them. # Holland2012 #DPDA
The French want another conception of the presidency of the Republic. High, but close and respectful. # Holland2012 #DPDA
My goal is to be the next President of the Republic. # Holland2012 #DPDA
Given my position, I have a duty to do nothing that can brutalize the country. # Holland2012 #DPDA
Upon taking office, I will allow those who started working early to leave at age 60. #Retirement # Holland2012 #DPDA
I'm not here to create problems, I'm here to find solutions. # Holland2012 #DPDA
I want a separation between credit banking and speculation banking. # Holland2012 #DPDA
We will have to limit the increase in public spending to 1% per year. # Holland2012 #DPDA
There is a price of the medicine that is too high. We will reduce prices, and expenses. #Health # Holland2012 #DPDA
I prefer to finance prevention. #Health # Holland2012 #DPDA
We will stabilize the public service workforce. # Holland2012 #DPDA
Education, justice and security will be preserved. All other administrations will have an effort to make. # Holland2012 #DPDA
The energy transition is to advance renewable energies. # Holland2012 #DPDA
Only 10% of children under 3 years are welcomed in nursery classes. We will triple that number. It's a question of justice.
The current European treaty organizes austerity if it is not renegotiated. # Holland2012 #DPDA
I will not sacrifice the interests of my country. I will not ratify this treaty unless it is renegotiated. #Europe # Holland2012 #DPDA
Legal immigration follows rules. Today, 180,000 people legally arrive in France each year. # Holland2012 #DPDA
We need foreign students. I will repeal the circular Gueant, which deprives our universities of considerable assets. # Hollande2012
What I can not tolerate is irregular immigration. # Holland2012 #DPDA
I propose a brigade specialized in the fight against clandestine channels. #Immigration # Holland2012 #DPDA
We will block gas prices for 3 months. # Holland2012 #DPDA
My proposals not to support the rise in the price of fuels on consumers: http://t.co/Xu6QZ0GE # Holland2012
The tax treaties will have to be renegotiated with Switzerland, Belgium and Luxembourg. # Holland2012 #DPDA
I will never influence a magistrate. # Holland2012 #DPDA
If I am tomorrow President, I will announce to our allies that we will withdraw from Afghanistan by the end of 2012. # Holland2012 #DPDA
For several months now, I have set the goal of reducing the proportion of nuclear power generation by 25% by 2025. #DPDA
I wish to powerfully stimulate renewable energies. # Holland2012 #DPDA
You have increased tax inequality as never before and you would come here to teach me about the sound management of public finances?
There will be a 0.1% increase in social security contributions to fund pensions. # Holland2012 #DPDA
When we are able to raise VAT and lower the ISF, we sign a policy. # Holland2012 #DPDA
You have a record, that of your majority for 10 years. You have increased the expenditure, widened the inequalities. # Holland2012 #DPDA
You disorganized the school of the Republic, you weakened the capacities of the National Education. # Holland2012 #DPDA
We must rekindle the fires of growth, otherwise we will be caught in the dizziness of austerity. # Holland2012 #DPDA
If we think that there will never be growth, then the election is only a contest of sacrifices. # Holland2012 #DPDA
France is European. I want to change the direction of the Union. # Holland2012 #DPDA
If we do not get another direction from the Union, the French will turn away from Europe. # Holland2012 #DPDA
Will come to the government those who accept my project. # Holland2012 #DPDA
Those who saw me tonight saw me as I am. # Holland2012 #DPDA

We had lunch with Fidel. He sent a giant hug to all the people of Venezuela! We will live and we will win!
Raul came to say goodbye to the airport and also sends a greeting Martiano and Bolivariano! Long live Cuba! Long live Venezuela!

Argentina and Chile were born together to independent life, we are united by more than 200 years of friendship.
But more importantly, we are united by a future of integration and integral cooperation.
Today we sign 7 agreements on the recognition of professional titles, organ transplants, agreements and energy integration, among others

I will introduce a framework directive on public services. #Europe # FH2012
I will not accept that immigration is used as a subject of contention, in France and in Europe. # FH2012
We will have to carry out a European defense policy. #Europe # FH2012
Europe is a power that ignores itself too much. #Europe # FH2012
We will have to move towards an even greater responsibility of the committee in front of the European Parliament. #Europe # FH2012
I believe in friendship between France and Germany. #Europe # FH2012
We must convince and we must overcome skepticism. #Europe # FH2012
Any relaxation in European ambition would be a retreat, a recoil on our nations. #Europe # FH2012
Progressives must mobilize for # Europe. # FH2012
Abdallah Sanusi arrest has been confirmed. The arrest of the criminal Abdullah al-Sanusi has been confirmed.

I forgot the extension extension. No extension of the presidency, the parliament, or any other institution. We want to consolidate our democratic system based on the rotation of power
There will be no extension to the Presidency term nor to any institution. We want to strengthen our democracy based on rotation of power.

N. Sarkozy is in a fight that is a leap forward. # TF1 # FH2012
His record is his ball and he does not present his project. # TF1 # FH2012
As N. Sarkozy can not present a balance sheet, nor a project, it presents a face which is that of the excess. # TF1 # FH2012
I have to win the left, I am the candidate of the change. That's my responsibility. # TF1 # FH2012
The recovery of France, in justice, requires behavior other than that of the incumbent. # TF1 # FH2012
The recovery of our public accounts implies tax increases. # TF1 # FH2012
The difference will be who will pay more. # TF1 # FH2012
All of the tax increases I am proposing will be on high income, high net worth and large corporations. # TF1 # FH2012
In which country do we want to live? I want to live in a peaceful country. # TF1 # FH2012
Those who have the most will have to give more and those who have the least will have to receive more. That's justice. # TF1 # FH2012
I want to give the youth of France a better future than today. # TF1 # FH2012
